A book had been published anonymously called Vestiges of the Natural History of Creation, and surprisingly it included content related to "transmutation of species".

Have you seen

this book? I thought you might like it,

so I brought you

a copy.

The title alone has caught

my eye.

No!

It only

presents

the problems with

evolution. It doesn’t provide any answer

as to why humans
and animals evolve!

The author’s expertise in geology and zoology

is elementary.

Either way, other scientists have been intensely critical of it.

Even I could tell that whoever wrote it doesn’t really know the definition

of species.

Even Sedgwick went so far as to curse the thing.

Sedgwick did?

154
